com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core

Interface I18NBinding

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultI18NBinding, I18NFacade

    public interface I18NBinding
    This Interface gives the developer the possibilities to create a StringBinding which is associated with a key / value pair from a ResourceBundle.

    To associated a key with a StringBinding the developer can use on the one side the methods which will expected directly a key (with optional arguments) or on the other side a Callable which computes then the message.

    The preferred way to used the methods from this interface is the usage from the builder I18NBindingBuilder.
    An other option for advanced developers is the facade I18NFacade.

    Since:
    0.1.0-PRERELEASE
    Version:
    0.6.1
    Author:
    Naoghuman
    See Also:
    I18NBindingBuilder, I18NFacade, ResourceBundle, Callable, StringBinding

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(Callable<String> function)
      Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given function.
      javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(String key)
      Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given key.
      javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(String key, Object... arguments)
      Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given key and the arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • createStringBinding

        javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(Callable<String> function)
        Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given function.

        Internal the StringBinding will be created with Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...) where the Observable is a I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty().

        Parameters:
        function - which should be used to create the StringBinding.
        Returns:
        the created StringBinding.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if function is NULL.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty(), Callable, Observable, Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...), StringBinding

      • createStringBinding

        javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(String key)
        Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given key.

        Internal the StringBinding will be created with Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...) where the Observable is a I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty().

        Parameters:
        key - which should be used to load the associated value.
        Returns:
        the created StringBinding.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if key is NULL.
        IllegalArgumentException - if key is EMPTY.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty(), Callable, Observable, Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...), StringBinding

      • createStringBinding

        javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding createStringBinding(String key,
                                                       Object... arguments)
        Creates a StringBinding to a localized String that is computed by calling the given key and the arguments.

        Internal the StringBinding will be created with Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...) where the Observable is a I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty().

        Parameters:
        key - which should be used to load the associated {code value}.
        arguments - which should be injected into the associated {code value}.
        Returns:
        the created StringBinding.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if (key || arguments) is NULL.
        IllegalArgumentException - if (key || arguments) is EMPTY.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NFacade.actualLocaleProperty(), Callable, Observable, Bindings.createStringBinding(java.util.concurrent.Callable, javafx.beans.Observable...), StringBinding
